name: MakerGear M3 Independent Dual Rev.0 0.50 Nozzle (Duplication Mode)

printer_notes.3.0.0:
Dont remove the following keywords! These keywords are used in the "compatible printer" condition of the print and filament profiles to link the particular print and filament profiles to this printer profile.
PRINTER_VENDOR_MAKERGEAR
PRINTER_MODEL_MAKERGEAR_M3_ID_0_DUPLICATION

printer_settings_id.3.0.0: MakerGear M3 Independent Dual Rev.0 0.50 Nozzle (Duplication Mode)

end_gcode.3.0.0:
M605 S0 ; set to full independent control
M104 S0 ; turn off extruder
M104 S0 T0 ; turn off extruder
M104 S0 T1 ; turn off extruder
M140 S0 ; turn off bed
M106 S0 ; turn off cooling fan
G91 ; relative mode
G1 Z20 ; move Z down 20mm if possible Max endstop will catch it if it is to far
G90 ;  absolute mode
G28 X ; home tools
T0 ; default tool should always be T0
G1 Y230 F10000 ; move build plate out
M84 ; disable motors

start_gcode.3.0.0:
;M3 ID Duplication Mode startup script
M211 S1 ; turn on soft endstops to protect the machine
M605 S0 ; set to full independent control on x axes
G28 XYZ ; home without mesh level compensation

; Set hotend temperature
M104 T0 S{first_layer_temperature[0]}
M104 T1 S{first_layer_temperature[0]}

; Wait for hotend's to reach temperature
M109 T0 S{first_layer_temperature[0]}
M109 T1 S{first_layer_temperature[0]}

T0 ; Make sure we're on T0
M605 S2 R0 X100 ; set X to duplication mode 0 temperature difference 100 X difference
G28 X ; home x axes to engange mode
M211 S0 ; turn off soft endstops to let us move to back of the bed
G1 X20 F1000 ; move to start x position
G1 Y243 Z0.1 F10000 ; move off the bed and bring the bed up
G92 E0 ; zero extruder
G1 Y240 Z0.1 F1000 ; scrape off any ooze
G1 Z0.30 F1000 ; lift
G1 X80 E9.25 ; lift F1000 ; deposit extrusion line
G1 Y239  E9.45 F1000 ; move  and extrude y
G1 X30 E17.05 ; lift F1000 ; deposit extrusion line
G1 X20 Z0.05 F1000 ; wipe off tail
G1 Z10 Y223 ; lift to avoid clips and move back to safe bounds
M400 ; wait for moves to finish before proceeding so that T1 doesn't get caught in a deadzone when switching back to Soft endstops on 
;
;
M211 S0 ; turn off soft endstops  
G92 E0; zero extruder
